boost::sql_cli::connection

boost::sql_cli::connection Class Reference

#include <boost/sql_cli/connection.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Represents a connection to a database of a specific backend type. Different connection instances may be used in different threads without explicit synchronization.


Constructors

 connection (std::string const &dbms)
 Initializes the backend specified in the 'dbms' argument.
 connection (std::string const &dbms, std::string const &srv, std::string const &user, std::string const &auth)
 Initializes the backend and opens the 'srv' database, with user 'user' and password 'auth'.

Connection management

void connect (std::string const &srv, std::string const &user, std::string const &auth)
 Opens the 'srv' database, with user 'user' and password 'auth'.
void disconnect ()
 Closes the connection to the database.

Transaction management

void commit ()
 Commits the current transaction.
void rollback ()
 Rolls back the current transaction.
